trans-unit.source: There are several ways to embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework.

seg-source.mrk: There are several ways to embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework.

target.mrk: There are several ways to embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework.

trans-unit.source: This is the easiest way to provide connectivity to multiple users who are accessing <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases from different JVMs. The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server provides this kind of connectivity to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases within a single system or over a network.

seg-source.mrk: This is the easiest way to provide connectivity to multiple users who are accessing <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases from different JVMs.

The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server provides this kind of connectivity to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases within a single system or over a network.

target.mrk: This is the easiest way to provide connectivity to multiple users who are accessing <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases from different JVMs.

The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server provides this kind of connectivity to <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases within a single system or over a network.

trans-unit.source: You can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> within many server frameworks, such as IBM WebSphere Application Server.

seg-source.mrk: You can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> within many server frameworks, such as IBM WebSphere Application Server.

target.mrk: You can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> within many server frameworks, such as IBM WebSphere Application Server.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s flexibility allows other configurations as well. For example, rather than embedding <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server that communicates with a client that uses JDBC, you can embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> within a servlet in a web server that communicates with a browser using HTTP.

For example, rather than embedding <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server that communicates with a client that uses JDBC, you can embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> within a servlet in a web server that communicates with a browser using HTTP.
